meanings.sent2: Please pass the salt to Miggs.
meanings.sent3: Miggs forgot his lunch at home again.
meanings.sent4: The name Miggs echoed through the classroom.
meanings.sent5: I always remember Miggs because of his unique name.

meanings.sent1: I love the taste of Miggs.
meanings.sent3: Miggs spilled his Miggs all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of Miggs filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: Grandma's Miggs are the best comfort food.

meanings.definition: A sound made by a small animal.
meanings.sent1: In the quiet forest, I heard a soft miggs.
meanings.sent2: The kitten let out a tiny miggs.
meanings.sent3: Miggs the mouse squeaked a loud miggs.
meanings.sent4: The night was filled with the gentle miggss of crickets.
meanings.sent5: The miggs of the squirrel alerted us to its presence.
